title: How to Make Chocolate Dipped Stuffed Dates

steps.headline: Cut choice dates open on one side and remove the seeds.
Fill the open space in the dates with a strip of preserved ginger or pineapple.
Add the chopped nuts (or chopped nuts mixed with white fondant or chocolate fondant).
Press the dates into a compact form to keep in the filling.
Dip them, one by one, in the melted chocolate.

text: Cut choice dates open on one side and remove the seeds.  Fill the open space in the dates with a strip of preserved ginger or pineapple.  Add the chopped nuts (or chopped nuts mixed with white fondant or chocolate fondant).  Press the dates into a compact form to keep in the filling.  Dip them, one by one, in the melted chocolate.  Finished.
